The Organ Mountains - Desert Peaks region has petroglyphs from three American Indian societies in its canyons , as well as desert grasslands and a petrified forest .
The area is twice as big as the Rio Grande del Norte National Monument in New Mexico , which previously held the ranking as Obama 's largest .
